gw.lang.parser

Class ISymbol

  • gw.lang.parser.ISymbol
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IHasType, IReducedSymbol

    public class ISymbol
implements IHasType, IReducedSymbol

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      IExpression DefaultValueExpression
      The symbol's default value e.g., a default parameter value for a function.
      String DisplayName
      Returns the Symbol's optional display name. If a display name is not assigned, returns the symbol's name.
      ISymbolTable DynamicSymbolTable
      Assigns an optional symbol table so that the symbol can get/set its value dynamically e.g., via ThreadLocalSymbolTable.
      int Index
      ISymbol LightWeightReference
      Creates a copy of this symbol without the value so that the empty symbol can be stored.
      boolean Local
      IModifierInfo ModifierInfo
      String Name
      Returns the Symbol's name.
      static String SUPER
      static String THIS
      IType Type
      Returns the Symbol's type.
      Object Value
      Returns the value assigned to this Symbol.
      boolean ValueBoxed
      boolean Writable
      Returns true if this symbol is writable.

      An example of a symbol that is not writable is a readonly Property referenced as a symbol in a Gosu class.

      • Fields inherited from class gw.lang.parser.IReducedSymbol

        Abstract, Final, FullDescription, GosuClass, Internal, Modifiers, Private, Protected, Public, Scope, ScriptPart, Static, SymbolClass

      void setValueIsBoxed(boolean b)
